entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Statement of profit or loss but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ciechsa:StratyZTytuluInstrumentowFinansowych, ciechsa:ZyskiZTytuluInstrumentowFinansowych All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 02 - Statement of other comprehensive income includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome of 141,732,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 283,464,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome that should add to 141,732,000 are comprised of the following:
+ ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests -1,094,000 + ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent 142,826,000 + OtherComprehensiveIncome 13,702,000 + ProfitLoss 128,030,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 02 - Statement of other comprehensive income. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome Total Value : 141,732,000 Total period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/259400GYHYZPQ0HTMT82/2020-12-31/ESEF/PL/0/ciechsa-2020-12-31.zip/ciechsa-2020-12-31/reports/ciechsa-2020-12-31.xhtml 10149
